Привет: Приветствуем в cashola.me $1, на базе VIVA! Скажите ПОМОЩЬ для списка опций, или выберете опцию

ПОМОЩЬ.default: Valid options are CURRENCY, BALANCE, SEND, PAY, WITHDRAW, DEPOSIT, VERIFY, CLAIM, BILL, TX, you can say HELP OPTION for more details
ПОМОЩЬ.CURRENCY: CURRENCY returns a list of all available currencies
ПОМОЩЬ.BALANCE: BALANCE [CURRENCY], such as BALANCE USD , or BALANCE ALL for a list of all your balances
ПОМОЩЬ.SEND: SEND [AMOUNT] [CURRENCY] [DESTINATION] [MEMO] e.g. SEND 1.00 USD TO 15556789012 Thank You!
ПОМОЩЬ.PAY: PAY [CODE] e.g. PAY 123456789 , pays the claim code
ПОМОЩЬ.WITHDRAW: WITHDRAW [AMOUNT] [CURRENCY] e.g. WITHDRAW 1.00 USD responds with [CODE]
ПОМОЩЬ.DEPOSIT: DEPOSIT [CURRENCY] , returns instructions on how to deposit funds
ПОМОЩЬ.VERIFY: VERIFY [CODE] , verifies a code as legitimate without claiming it.
ПОМОЩЬ.CLAIM: CLAIM [CODE] e.g. CLAIM 123456789 to claim withdrawal code 123456789
ПОМОЩЬ.BILL: BILL [AMOUNT] [CURRENCY] [PHONE] e.g. BILL 1.00 USD 13025551212 sends a bill to [PHONE] returns [CODE]
ПОМОЩЬ.TX: TX Lists the last 10 transactions to or from your account

PAY: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO PAY $1 $2 TO $3?
CLAIM: YOU HAVE CLAIMED $1 FOR $2 $3 YOUR NEW BALANCE IS $4
BILL: SENT A REQUEST TO $1 TO PAY $2 $3
